授業目的: This course is designed to enhance students' skills to read and discuss public administration and public policy in English.
到達目標: Students will be able to a) obtain basic knowledge about public administration, b) understand the characteristics of administrative institutions and their reforms, c) examine administrative issues in globalization from various angles.
授業の概要・背景: Students should have already taken Public Administration A or B.
授業方法: We deal with basic topics in public administration in English including welfare states, New Public Management, network governance, etc. Students are required to prepare discussion themes based on the readings.

トピック.授業計画1: We will read in a loop along with the textbook. Students who are in charge of reporting are expected to prepare their presentations.
トピック.授業外学習2: Students are expected to prepare and review each class on the designated scope.

評価.教科書Required texts0: Stella Z. Theodoulou & Ravi K. Roy (2016) "Public Administration: A very short introduction", Oxford University Press.

成績評価Grading2: プレゼンテーション・発表／Presentation (07)
成績評価Grading3: 授業への参加度（自発性、積極性、主体性、等）／In-class participation,contribution (09)
